n: A-Plus Italian Olive Oil Balsamic Bread Dip
des: "This recipe is similar to one at an Italian restaurant where I once worked, with a few changes for the better, of course!  I don't think it can get any better! Serve with your favorite Italian bread. Ready in minutes."
ins: Place the garlic, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, red pepper flakes, rosemary, and salt and pepper into a shallow bowl in that order. To serve, spoon small amount onto bread.
